title: As BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin User, I want updates made to the Drug Test Request widgets
custom_steps:
General:
 - Clean up spacing
  -- ID and Date columns can be tightened so they don't take up so much space

BOC Widget:
 - Move Request Turnaround column after Org Column
 - Results Reported column should show the TS the request status is update to Results Reported
  -- The column isn't currently populating with anything

title: As a BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin User, I want to be able to update key bio fields on a Drug Test Request
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin is viewing a Drug Test Request, they will see an edit option
* When the Request is in edit mode, the following bio fields will be editable (in addition to fields already editable):
** First Name
** Last Name
** Birth Date
** Birth Country
** Birth Province
** Birth City
* Saving the form will commit changes made to these fields
* If the Admin user updates these fields to a match, they will see the matching player when clicking Create Profile and be able to successfully link the request to that profile
* These changes will flow through to link

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want Close buttons to return me to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* After creating a new profile off of a drug test request, there will be a close button on the profile
* Clicking this close button will return the user to their entry point, the Drug Test Request widget
* Close button on Drug Test Requests should return the user to their entry point (which would most often be the Drug Test Request widget).  The user is currently brought to the Major League Summary page.

title: As a BOC Drug Testing User, I want an Org filter in the header of my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789987/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789987/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery]

Wireframe: [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc]

AC:

* There will be a new Org dropdown filter in the header of the BOCâ€™s Drug Test Request widget
* The filter will default to All Orgs
* Choosing a specific Org from this dropdown will filter the widget to only show requests submitted by the selected Org

title: As a Drug Testing User, I don't want National ID to be required for players (i.e. VZ)
custom_steps:
AC:

* National ID will not be required to create a Drug Test Request for players from Venezuela
* National ID will not be required to create a prospect profile off of a Drug Test Request for a player from Venezuela

title: Create additional Intl Ama Drug Test Request Permission and Map them to existing roles
custom_steps:
Create *ebis-intldrugtesting-editor* and map it to:

* *ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role*
* *ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-admin-role*
* *ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-admin-role*

Create *ebis-intldrugtesting-viewer* and map it to:

* *ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role*
* *ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-viewer-role*
* *ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-viewer-role*

title: As a Intl Drug Testing Admin, I want to export all of the fields from a Drug Test Request for all Players in the DTR widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* On the BOCâ€™s Drug Test Request widget, there will be a new â€œExportâ€� button
* Clicking the button will export the query provided into an Excel file.

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to receive certain data points from DTS so the Drug Testing Admins can be up to speed on the progress of the test and notify clubs:


Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS

AC
 - Set up the messaging queue
 - Set up a listener to process the request
 - Update the request in the database

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to send/make available certain data points to DTS so the Collector can locate the player and process the request:

Reqs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058

AC:
 - When the status of a Drug Test Request is updated to "Consent Signed / Test Pending" the messaging queue will fire and deliver the appropriate data points to DTS

title: As a User, I want to see the TWP Definition on the Two-Way Player Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to see TWP definition
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to TWP Utility 

Wires:  
Modal: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=twp_definition|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=twp_definition]

BOC: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc]

Club: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_club|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_club]
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "TWP Definition" button in the footer of the widget for BOC/Club users 
AND clicking the button will open a modal displaying the following text:
 "A player qualifies as a Two-Way Player only if he accrues at least 20 Major League innings pitched and at least 20 Major League games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games) in either the current championship season or the prior championship season"
AND clicking the X icon or Close button will dismiss the modal

title: As User, I want to see a Two-Way Player Displayed as TWP on reports
custom_steps:
WHEN player is designated as a Two-Way Player

AC:
 - When a player is designated as a Two-Way Player, their position will be displayed as TWP, on all reports
 - This will require identifying all reports that include postion
 - Updating all views necessary to accommodate the change
 - Verifying report did not break after inclusion of TWP
  -- Assumption is sorting / grouping will break on some reports
custom_expected:
THEN their position will be displayed as TWP, on all reports 
 - MJ Roster
 - PIS
 - Opening Day Roster
 - Post Season Eligibility Roster
 - Wild Card Roster
 - Division Series Roster
 - League Championship Roster
 - World Series Roster 
 - Reserve List
 - Reserve List Submission
 - Roster Detail
 - Org Chart
 - Major Contract Terms 

AND verify reports did not break after inclusion of TWP (assumption is sorting/grouping will break on some reports)

title: As a BOC User, I want to set positions for the players on my Two-Way Player widget

title: As a User, I want to see a pitcher stats on my Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to TWO-WAY PLAYERS widget
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN user is viewing 'Starts at Pos Player' column
custom_expected:
THEN column will display stats, for current year as Games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games)

AND The column header will have a tool tip with the following text:
-- "Games started as a position player or designated hitter (with at least three plate appearances in each of those games)"

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN  User wants to see when a player is approaching TWP threshold
custom_steps:
Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

WHEN User is viewing Two Way Player widget
custom_expected:
THEN   Player will be considered 'Approaching' when player reaches 15 IP and 15 GS*
AND    If player is consider "Approaching", in Designate TWP column, "Approaching" will display
AND    If a player reaches 15 IP or 15 GS*, his stats will change color (depicted in the wire) 
If player's position is set as a pitcher, check against IP
-- Position in: LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS
If player's position is set as a position player, check against GS
-- Position in: C, IF, SS, UTL, 1B, 2B, 3B, CF, LF, OF, RF, DH, PH

title: As a User, I want to see a when a player is crosses the Two-Way Player threshold on the Two-Way Player widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the User is viewing the Two-Way Player widget 
AND wants to view who crossed TWP threshold
custom_steps:
WHEN the User is searching the Two-Way Player widget for players that crossed the Two Way Player threshold

Wire: https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=two-way_players_-_boc

Data Discovery: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/19238264/Data+Discovery+-+Two-Way+Player+Widget

THEN The Two-Way Player threshold will be considered 20 IP and 20 GS*
AND  If a player reaches 20 IP or 20 GS*, his stats will change color to green (depicted in the wire)
AND  When a player reaches 20 IP & 20 GS*, a clipboard notification will be generated for both the player's club and the BOC
AND  "Eligible" will display in "Designate Two-Way Player" column

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player is approaching the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player is considered to be approaching (15 IP or 15 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club as members of the BOC and indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Approaching Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] is approaching the threshold for Two-Way Player designation. Please log into EBIS to review and contact BOC with any questions or concerns.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

title: As User, I want to receive an email when a player crosses the Two-Way Player threshold
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN a player has crossed the threshold for two-way player designation (20 IP and 20 GS)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to the player's club and members of the BOC as indicated on the email utility:
- Subject: Player Has Reached Two-Way Player Threshold
- Content: [Player Roster First] [Player Last] has satisfied the criteria for being designated a Two-Way Player.

In the event that you would like [Player Roster First] [Player Last] to officially be considered a Two-Way Player per the Major League Rules, you must contact BOC to make that change. Until BOC has approved the change, [Player Last] will continue to be considered a (BOC Position) for the purposes of pitcher and position player roster limits.

AND the email will contain a link to the Two-Way Player Utility

AC:

* There will be a new â€œDPL Updated Eligible Playersâ€� on the Admin tab of the Rule 4 dashboard in ebis
* The widget will appear below the Domestic Amateur Players widget
* The widget will be populated with player who have an Draft Status of â€œEligibleâ€� and have been updated in DPL since being marked Eligible

title: As a DAPM Admin User, I do not want Eligibility on Dom Ama profiles reset when updates are made in DPL
custom_steps:
Business Value:
Currently, if updates are made to a player in DPL after the player is marked eligible in ebis, the following fields are reset when the updates are sent to ebis:
  -- Eligibility Status (set back to Pending Eligible)
  -- 21+ Eligible
  -- Not Subject to Deadline
This was originally implemented to ensure updated players got a 2nd eligibility check.  In practice, it was the BOC making most of these changes and it created extra work for them.

AC:
 - If updates are made to a player in DPL after the player is marked eligible in ebis, the following fields will not be reset/updated when the updates are sent to ebis:
  -- Eligibility Status (set back to Pending Eligible)
  -- 21+ Eligible
  -- Not Subject to Deadline

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want clubs to be prevented from Requesting to travel a player who is out of days
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a user clicks submit on a travel auth form, the system will compare the Arrival Date on the form to the playerâ€™s Next Check-in Allowed Date (displayed on profile)
* If the Arrival Date is earlier than the Next Check In Allowed date, the system will return an error message:
** Body: You may not request to travel a player prior to his next allowable check in. Please contact the BOC for more information."
** Buttons: Back
* This will be a hard error for Clubs, but will be overrideable for BOC.

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to see a Did Not Complete Travel checkbox on Travel Forms
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new â€œDid Not Complete Travelâ€� checkbox in the Travel Expenses section of the Travel Authorization form
* This field be only be editable by BOC Users
* This field will be visible to Club user, however it will only be visible if the box is checked
** If the box is not checked, Club users will not be able to see the field

title: As BOC AMT User, I want to see a BOC Only Comment Box on Prospect Profiles
custom_steps:
AC:

* BOC Users will see a new Comments section at the bottom of all Prospect Profiles in AMT
* This section and the comments box will only be visible to BOC Users
* The comments box will be editable in edit mode and clicking save will commit changes

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to see an Audit History on Travel Forms
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new History tab added to Travel Auth forms as depicted in the wire
* This History tab will log all actions taken with a Travel form
** All state changes, attachments, and added comments
* The History tab will only be visible to BOC users

title: As an AMT User, I want to see a Comments Section on Travel Forms
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new comments section added to the Travel Auth forms, as depicted in the provided wire
* This section will be accessed by both Club Users and BOC Users
* Club Users may only modify or delete their comments prior to saving
** Once they save, their own comment becomes view only
* BOC Users will be able to delete comments at any time
* Comments added will appear in ascending order, with the most recent displayed at the bottom

title: Update camera/photo functionality
custom_steps:
Wireframe: Attached

AC:

* If the user captures a photo they have a discard button, clicking discard allows them to take another picture or click to upload a photo
* If the user browses to select a previously taken photo they have a discard button, clicking discard allows them to take another picture or click to upload a photo
* Update the styling of the discard button

title: As a BOC Trans Super Admin User, I want to see Roster Notes in the Footer of the PIS Report
custom_steps:
AC:

* The Player Information Summary Report will display comments added into the Roster Comments box at the bottom of the report
* This comment field will need to be permission based as only BOC Transaction Super Admin Users are allowed to see these comments

title: As a User, I would like recently Outrighted Players to appear on the Player Information Summary Report
custom_steps:
INC0141297

AC:

* Player whoâ€™s Outright Date is *<= 15* Day earlier than todayâ€™s date, the player will appear on the Player Information Summary Report
* The report should not run any slower
* This will apply to both position players and pitchers

From: Sam Menzin <Sam.Menzin@tigers.com [Sam.Menzin@tigers.com|mailto:Sam.Menzin@tigers.com]>

Just going through some old notes, would it be possible to add outrighted players to the Player Info Summary report if they are still within the 10-day period? Thanks,

Sam

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want updates to the PIS Report
custom_steps:
AC:

* The Waivers Request Date column will be removed from the Player Information Summary Report
* The Outright Waivers in Effect column will be renamed to "Waivers in Effect"
* Values in the Waivers in Effect column will include the following:
** Y
** N
** Pending
*** Pending will only appear in the Waivers in Effect column if the player appears on  an unexpired waiver bulletin
* Potential MNFA column will include an * if the player would be a free agent, only if outrighted during the minor league season that year and accrues his final year toward free agency.
** (as opposed to a player who already used 1 of 1 or 7 of 7 â€“ that player should get the Y without the *.)
** This is the same asterisk that appears on the Contract History widget ([https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/contracts?playerId=369646|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/contracts?playerId=369646])
** Will add a footnote explaining what the asterisk means â€œ* - Player will only become a FA if assigned during current seasonâ€�

title: INC0145557: E-Sig Status Fields
custom_steps:
AC:

* Signed and Read fields will not appear on the E-signature status modal until values are available to be displayed



From Gina:

On the E-Sig popup, there are labels which say â€œSignedâ€�, â€œReadâ€�, and â€œSignedâ€�. When the contract has reached those statuses, dates pop up to the right of the labels. Gina was saying that it is a bit confusing to see the labels without the dates, because it implies that the contract was signed and read when it actually wasnâ€™t. So she was wondering if the label(s) should be hidden until there is an action. I.e., it wouldnâ€™t show â€œSignedâ€� until it was actually signed on a date, it wouldnâ€™t show â€œReadâ€� until it was actually read on a date, etc.

In the attachment, right now it shows "Signed" but there isn't a date next to it (because it's a label). That label shouldn't appear _until_ there's a date associated with that event.

title: As a BOC Trans Super Admin User, I want to see a Roster Notes widget on the MJ/MN Roster Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC Trans Super Admin
AND wants to see Roster Notes widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to MJ/MN Rosters tab 

Wireframe: [https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=major_league_roster|https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=major_league_roster]
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Trans Super Admin users will see an expandable comment section as depicted in wireframe
AND Clicking "expand" will expand the section
AND Clicking "collapse" will collapse the section
AND Roster Notes widget will be collapsed by default, unless there are comments present
AND Clicking save will commit the changes made to the comments section
AND This will be a shared comment box (all Trans Super Admins can view comments entered)
AND notes widget will have 800 character limit
AND comments will be unique to each ORG

title: As a user I want the contract language advanced search to return results
custom_steps:
Update the contract langauge advanced search to use dbms_lob.instr (or other functions in that package) to improve performance.

Example SQL showing usage:

select 
   langdata.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID
from 
   LANGUAGE_CUSTOM cust 
JOIN (select CLAUSE_TYPE_ID from clause_type_lkup where language_level_id = 2) clauseType 
    on clauseType.CLAUSE_TYPE_ID = cust.CLAUSE_TYPE_ID
Join LANGUAGE_DATA langdata 
    on cust.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID = langdata.LANGUAGE_DATA_ID
where 
   dbms_lob.instr(lower(LANGUAGE_DATA_CLOB_SEARCHABLE),'recoup')>0;
